Method Details [hide private]

__new__(meta, class_name, bases, class_dict)
Static Method

 

Create subclasses of MPTTModel. This:

  • adds the MPTT fields to the class
  • adds a TreeManager to the model
Returns: a new object with type S, a subtype of T
Overrides: object.__new__

register(meta, cls, **kwargs)
Class Method

 

For the weird cases when you need to add tree-ness to an *existing* class. For other cases you should subclass MPTTModel instead of calling this.
